page.title: 10Home Entertainment-Glanaman.
page.content: A survey was made of the families in Glanaman who have children between the ages of 5 and 11, to find out how these families spend their leisure hours at home. It seems that{98%}of families spend some time reading,{62%}have a hobby which they pursue and{77%}of families have access to some kind of musical instrument. However, a strong emphasis emerged on the dependance of modern families on electrical/technical equipment as a means of entertainment. The table below shows this trend. {Percentage of families using following {equipment during leisure hours. Television 96% Record Player/HiFi 96% Tape Recorder 88% Video Recorder 51% and rising Computers 37%
